title: I'm Leny, 35, full-stack webdeveloper.
description: Currently working as _Lead Coach_ at [BeCode](https://becode.org) (in Belgium), forging the next generation of webdevelopers.
Passionate about teaching and [sharing code](https://github.com/leny) with the community.
